pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:1.16: For the further development of these events, see [pli-tv-kd11:25.1.1]()–31.1.219.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss12:2.56: The Pali text just says _dukkaṭa_, without specifying that it is an _āpatti_, an offense. Yet just below the text says that the _dukkaṭa_ is annulled if you commit the full offense of _saṅghādisesa_. The implication is that _dukkaṭa_ should be read as _āpatti dukkaṭassa_, “an offense of wrong conduct”.
